languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс сдавленно вздыхает.{/n} "Клянусь Золотым Троном, {name}, и всем, что свято... Я не могу сказать тебе все, не преступив запреты и клятвы, что выше тебя и меня. Есть границы, которые я не могу перейти".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс сдавленно вздыхает.{/n} "Клянусь Золотым Троном, {name}, и всем, что свято... Я не могу сказать тебе все, не преступив запреты и клятвы, что выше тебя и меня. Есть границы, которые я не могу перейти".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lets out a strained sigh.{/n} "I swear on the Golden Throne and all that is holy, {name}... I cannot reveal everything without contravening prohibitions and vows that are far more important than you or I. There are lines I cannot cross."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс сдавленно вздыхает.{/n} "Клянусь Золотым Троном, {name}, и всем, что свято... Я не могу сказать тебе все, не преступив запреты и клятвы, что выше тебя и меня. Есть границы, которые я не могу перейти".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a strained sigh.{/n} "I swear on the Golden Throne and all that is holy, {name}... I cannot reveal everything without contravening prohibitions and vows that are far more important than you or I. There are lines I cannot cross."

{n}Heinrix lets out a strained sigh.{/n} "I swear on the Golden Throne and all that is holy, {name}... I cannot reveal everything without contravening prohibitions and vows that are far more important than you or I. There are lines I cannot cross."

{n}Heinrix lets out a strained sigh.{/n} "I swear on the Golden Throne and all that is holy, {name}... I cannot reveal everything without contravening prohibitions and vows that are far more important than you or I. There are lines I cannot cross."

{n}Heinrix lets out a strained sigh.{/n} "I swear on the Golden Throne and all that is holy, {name}... I cannot reveal everything without contravening prohibitions and vows that are far more important than you or I. There are lines I cannot cross."

languages.text: {n}海因里希艰难地叹了口气。{/n}“我向黄金王座与一切神圣之物发誓，{name}……我无法在不违背禁令与誓言的情况下透露这些信息。这些禁令与誓言比你我都重要得多，有些底线我是绝对不能越过的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a strained sigh.{/n} "I swear on the Golden Throne and all that is holy, {name}... I cannot reveal everything without contravening prohibitions and vows that are far more important than you or I. There are lines I cannot cross."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希艰难地叹了口气。{/n}“我向黄金王座与一切神圣之物发誓，{name}……我无法在不违背禁令与誓言的情况下透露这些信息。这些禁令与誓言比你我都重要得多，有些底线我是绝对不能越过的。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix suelta un suspiro tenso.{/n} «Lo juro por el Trono Dorado y por todo lo que es sagrado, {name}... pero no puedo revelar nada más sin infringir prohibiciones y juramentos más importantes que usted y que yo. Hay líneas que no puedo cruzar».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a strained sigh.{/n} "I swear on the Golden Throne and all that is holy, {name}... I cannot reveal everything without contravening prohibitions and vows that are far more important than you or I. There are lines I cannot cross."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix suelta un suspiro tenso.{/n} «Lo juro por el Trono Dorado y por todo lo que es sagrado, {name}... pero no puedo revelar nada más sin infringir prohibiciones y juramentos más importantes que usted y que yo. Hay líneas que no puedo cruzar».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは苦しそうにため息をつく。{/n}「黄金の玉座と聖なるものすべてに誓う。{name}…俺は、あなたや俺よりもはるかに重要な禁止事項や誓いに反することなく、すべてを明らかにすることはできないんないんだ。俺には、その一線を超えられない」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a strained sigh.{/n} "I swear on the Golden Throne and all that is holy, {name}... I cannot reveal everything without contravening prohibitions and vows that are far more important than you or I. There are lines I cannot cross."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは苦しそうにため息をつく。{/n}「黄金の玉座と聖なるものすべてに誓う。{name}…俺は、あなたや俺よりもはるかに重要な禁止事項や誓いに反することなく、すべてを明らかにすることはできないんないんだ。俺には、その一線を超えられない」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix pousse un soupir.{/n} « Je le jure sur le Trône d'Or et tout ce qui est sacré, {name}... Je ne peux pas vous en dire plus sans aller à l'encontre d'interdictions et de serments qui sont bien plus importants que vous et moi. Il y a des limites que je ne peux franchir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a strained sigh.{/n} "I swear on the Golden Throne and all that is holy, {name}... I cannot reveal everything without contravening prohibitions and vows that are far more important than you or I. There are lines I cannot cross."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix pousse un soupir.{/n} « Je le jure sur le Trône d'Or et tout ce qui est sacré, {name}... Je ne peux pas vous en dire plus sans aller à l'encontre d'interdictions et de serments qui sont bien plus importants que vous et moi. Il y a des limites que je ne peux franchir. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix seufzt angestrengt.{/n} "Ich schwöre auf den Goldenen Thron und auf alles, was heilig ist, {name} ... Ich darf nicht alles offenlegen, sonst würde ich gegen Verbote und Eide verstoßen, die viel wichtiger sind als Ihr oder ich. Es gibt Grenzen, die ich nicht überschreiten kann."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a strained sigh.{/n} "I swear on the Golden Throne and all that is holy, {name}... I cannot reveal everything without contravening prohibitions and vows that are far more important than you or I. There are lines I cannot cross."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix seufzt angestrengt.{/n} "Ich schwöre auf den Goldenen Thron und auf alles, was heilig ist, {name} ... Ich darf nicht alles offenlegen, sonst würde ich gegen Verbote und Eide verstoßen, die viel wichtiger sind als Ihr oder ich. Es gibt Grenzen, die ich nicht überschreiten kann."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, gergin bir şekilde iç çekiyor.{/n} "Altın Taht ve kutsal olan her şey üzerine yemin ederim {name}... Senden de benden de çok daha mühim olan yasakları ve antları ihlal etmeden her şeyi açıklamam mümkün değil. Aşamayacağım sınırlar var."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a strained sigh.{/n} "I swear on the Golden Throne and all that is holy, {name}... I cannot reveal everything without contravening prohibitions and vows that are far more important than you or I. There are lines I cannot cross."
